name: UP889131 - Asteroids 2018
description:
Introduction

Duke it out with the classic flavours of asteroids (big, medium, and small) with a coat of fresh paint from the asset store! The odds of you successfully navigating through the game are 3,720 to 1!

------------------------------

Controls

All keybinds can be remapped using Unity's launcher, however the default controls are below

W - Forwards

A / D - Left / Right

Space - Shoot

H - Hyperspace (Teleport to random location.. Even inside of asteroids)

Esc - Pause

------------------------------

Credits

This game was made by following this tutorial.

Sprites - http://millionthvector.blogspot.com

Asteroid Sprites - https://forum.thegamecreators.com/thread/209786

Particle Effects - Unity Particle Pack

Sounds 

- Retro Pack Zero Rare

- Detonator Explosion Framework - Ben Throop

Music - Loop & Music Free - Marching Dream

Ship  Engine Sound - Sparta Themed Inspired Airplane - Hermino Perez

Alien Ship Engine Sound - Retro Games Sound FX - Bright Shining Star
